effect_entries.short_effect: Power is higher when the user weighs more than the target, up to a maximum of 120.
effect_entries.effect:
Inflicts regular damage.  The greater the user's weight compared to the target's, the higher power this move has, to a maximum of 120.

User's weight                    | Power
-------------------------------- | ----:
Up to 2× the target's weight     |    40
Up to 3× the target's weight     |    60
Up to 4× the target's weight     |    80
Up to 5× the target's weight     |   100
More than 5× the target's weight |   120

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
燃える　体で　相手に　ぶつかって
攻撃する。自分が　相手より
重いほど　威力が　あがる。

The user slams its target with its flame-
covered body. The more the user outweighs
the target, the greater the move’s power.

Chi la usa carica con il suo corpo rovente. Più è
pesante rispetto al bersaglio e più danni causa.

El usuario ataca con su cuerpo ardiente. Cuanto
mayor sea su peso comparado con el del objetivo, 
más daño causará.

Rempelattacke mit brennendem Körper.
Je schwerer der Anwender im Vergleich
zum Ziel ist, desto stärker die Attacke.

Le lanceur projette son corps enflammé contre
l’ennemi. S’il est plus lourd que l’ennemi, l’effet
augmente en conséquence.

불타는 몸으로 상대에게 부딪쳐서
공격한다. 자신이 상대보다
무거울수록 위력이 올라간다.

もえる　からだで　あいてに　ぶつかって
こうげきする。じぶんが　あいてより
おもいほど　いりょくが　あがる。
